titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR (CERVICAL STROMA) - Description

body.p: MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR (CERVICAL STROMA) Â is the same as attribute MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR FOR PARAMETRIUM OR CERVICAL STROMA , to indicate if there is microscopic involvement of the cervical stroma during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell .
